module.name: Core
module.changelog: *14.0.28.88* FREEI-2762 974250 - PJSIP - Set Auth User Name *14.0.28.87* FREEI-2762 Ticket#974250 - PJSIP - Set Auth User Name *14.0.28.86* Add ability to hide trunks in routes ui *14.0.28.85* FREEI-2848 core with outbound CID *14.0.28.84* FREEI-2738 PBX does not forward the original callerID to a misc destination *14.0.28.83* Packaging of ver 14.0.28.83 *14.0.28.82* FREEPBX-21952 Update comment note for from-pstn-custom *14.0.28.81* Packaging of ver 14.0.28.81 *14.0.28.80* Packaging of ver 14.0.28.80 *14.0.28.79* FREEPBX-21732 Email notification on outbound routes on call success / pattern match *14.0.28.78* FREEI-1964 making PJSIP extension's rewrite_contact 'yes' *14.0.28.77* FREEPBX-21732 Execute notification email before dial on pattern match *14.0.28.76* FREEI-1379 adding RTP timeout configuration for pjsip extensions *14.0.28.75* FREEPBX-21582 Custom device caller ID broken *14.0.28.74* FREEPBX-21582 Custom device caller ID broken *14.0.28.73* FREEI-1481 Outbound Routes - move paging Notifications setting to the new tab *14.0.28.72* FREEPBX-21565 Call confirm does not work since updates *14.0.28.71* FREEI-1443 fixe syntax error in Asterisk dial plan anyway. *14.0.28.70* FREEI-1468 if default_user is coming blank, it should be equal to user value *14.0.28.69* FREEPBX-21382 Alert-Info header unconfigurably passed through to trunk when forwarding *14.0.28.68* FREEI-1468: to update default_user value from extension advance setting form *14.0.28.67* To add voicemail_extension value in pjsip.endpoint.conf *14.0.28.66* FREEI-1349 Add indication tones for Indonesia *14.0.28.65* FREEPBX-21450: Fix broken Outbound Routes after update, for fpbx14 *14.0.28.64* FREEPBX-21437: optimized outbound route notification email script usage *14.0.28.63* bump *14.0.28.62* FREEI-687 Add convert2pjsip script success message *14.0.28.61* FREEI-1284: added feature to send out an email when an Outbound Route is dialed *14.0.28.60* FREEI-1351 Emergency CID lost from ASTDB when upgrading *14.0.28.59* FREEI-1325 FastAGI setting not using FastAGI in dialplan *14.0.28.58* FREEI-687 Add cli tool to convert SIP to PJSIP *14.0.28.57* FREEI-1090 Error message when exceeding license count *14.0.28.56* FREEI-1192 Return a list of route strings, rather each as array of itself. *14.0.28.55* FREEI-1192 Sequence should be the entire list, not just a single row *14.0.28.54* FREEI-1316 Getting syntax error in asterisk CLI while the appointment reminder call is getting dialled. *14.0.28.53* FREEI-1192 *14.0.28.52* FREEI-1181 Setting the Contact Header part dynamically with the Caller ID value *14.0.28.51* FREEI-1183 Contact User in PJSIP isn't setting the User part of the Contact Header *14.0.28.50* FREEPBX-20225 Queue with Skip Busy set to Yes transferred calls not working properly *14.0.28.49* Add webrtc config option *14.0.28.48* Fixing FREEI-1243 *14.0.28.47* FREEI-1235 Location Name added in Hotdesking CallerID mapping is not passing *14.0.28.46* FREEI-1232 callerid issue 14+ *14.0.28.45* FREEI-1226 Conflicts 13-> 14 *14.0.28.44* FREEI-683 fixe attended transfer for pjsip extension *14.0.28.43* FREEI-1086 14 *14.0.28.42* bump *14.0.28.41* bump *14.0.28.40* FREEI-1074: moved Emergency CID field from Advanced tab to general/main tab, under Outbound CID, when adding/modifying an extension *14.0.28.39* FREEI-1180 Fixes issue with contact_user not being added to PJSIP trunk endpoints. *14.0.28.38* FREEI-995 User should be optional when generating config *14.0.28.37* FREEPBX-21062 *14.0.28.36* Additional PJSIP settings for video *14.0.28.35* FREEI-1138 Latest core module dependency issue with framework *14.0.28.34* FREEPBX-21031 Default FPBX setting for rewrite_contact differs from Asterisk *14.0.28.33* FREEI-1073 *14.0.28.32* FREEPBX-20683: mention the RFC7462 setting *14.0.28.31* FREEPBX-20955 Dialplan warning ast_expr2.fl:470 ast_yyerror: syntax error *14.0.28.30* Fixing FREEPBX-20811 *14.0.28.29* FREEPBX-18699 Default FPBX setting for rewrite_contact differs from Asterisk *14.0.28.28* FREEPBX-20810 Whoops\Exception\ErrorException Allowed memory size *14.0.28.27* FREEI-1022 force_callerid code got removed by mistake. *14.0.28.26* FREEPBX-20843 Latest Core module from Edge breaks PJSip trunks *14.0.28.25* Allow PJSIP config to force callerid setting *14.0.28.24* FREEPBX-20441 getStatus(module_name) doesn't exist anymore, checkStatus(module_name) is the good one. *14.0.28.23* FREEPBX-20441 FreePBX 13 to SNG7 update breaks calling *14.0.28.22* FREEPBX-20656 fix
